planets.lore_description:
Tatooine is a desert world with a arid climate, home to a massive (trillions) population 
governed by a anarchist collective. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's desert environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

final_boss.name: Overlord Nexar
final_boss.title: Fallen One
final_boss.motivation: plans to rule through fear and domination
final_boss.backstory:
Overlord Nexar, known as Fallen One, is a Human who plans to rule through fear and domination. 

Born during the old republic era, Overlord Nexar was once a promising individual who 
showed great potential in the Force. However, their path took a dark turn when they 
discovered ancient secrets that changed their perspective on the galaxy.

Their current plan involves plans to rule through fear and domination, which directly threatens the stability 
of the galaxy. The events described in "i want a 15-hour light side adventure about rescuing jedi from sith captivity" are merely the beginning 
of their grand design.

Overlord Nexar has spent years gathering followers and resources, preparing for this moment when 
they can finally implement their vision for the galaxy's future. They see themselves 
not as a villain, but as a necessary force for change in a corrupt and stagnant galaxy.
mechanics: Boss can absorb and redirect player abilities
Boss alternates between aggressive and defensive phases
Boss gains new abilities and changes tactics at 75%, 50%, and 25% health

phases.name: Opening Assault
phases.tactics: Aggressive attacks to test the player's strength

phases.name: Escalation
phases.tactics: Introduces environmental hazards and summons minions

phases.name: Desperation
phases.tactics: Uses most powerful abilities and becomes more unpredictable

phases.name: Final Stand
phases.tactics: Unleashes full power in a last desperate attempt

final_boss.arena_description: A location where the Force is unusually strong and unpredictable Located on Endor, this force_nexus reflects the planet's volcanic environment. The Force itself seems alive here, amplifying all abilities.

loot_drop.name: Overlord Nexar's Legacy
loot_drop.flavor_text: The final remnant of Fallen One Overlord Nexar's power. This legendary weapon pulses with the Force energy of its former owner, granting incredible abilities to those worthy enough to wield it.

main_quest_outline:
MAIN QUEST: I Want A 15-Hour Light Side Adventure About Rescuing Jedi From Sith Captivity

ACT I - The Call to Adventure
- Begin on Tatooine: Discover the threat to the galaxy
- Learn of Overlord Nexar's dark plans
- Gather allies and begin your heroic journey

ACT II - The Hero's Journey
- Travel to 2 worlds to stop the darkness
- Save civilizations and gain powerful allies
- Uncover Overlord Nexar's weakness

ACT III - The Light Triumphant
- Confront Overlord Nexar on Endor
- Rally your allies for the final battle in A location where the Force is unusually strong and unpredictable Located on Endor, this force_nexus reflects the planet's volcanic environment. The Force itself seems alive here, amplifying all abilities.
- Restore peace and balance to the galaxy
campaign_summary:
Campaign: I Want A 15-Hour Light Side Adventure About Rescuing Jedi From Sith Captivity
Duration: 15 hours
Era: Old Republic
Alignment: Light Side focus

Your journey will take you across 5 worlds including Tatooine, Coruscant, Naboo, and 2 other worlds.
The ultimate confrontation awaits with Overlord Nexar, plans to rule through fear and domination.

This campaign emphasizes light side choices and is set during the old republic era.
